summary: Adds a new spell in the game. A new Overpowered spell.
descriptionHtml:
Description
__________________________
Have you ever wanted to run around burning everyone?? Well I have. So i created this mod. Once you have installed the mod, load a save and check your inventory. You will have a book called "Spell Tome: Extreme Flame". Read it like any other spell tome and enjoy the killing.. MUAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHH!!!!!!

Installation
___________________
Nexus Mod Manager
1) Click download with NMM

Manual Installation
1) Download the file.
2) Extract the file
3) Copy/Move the file to your Skyrim/Data directory

Visit this website for game reviews
_____________________________________
http://blackrapgames.host-ed.me/
author: XGhostSlayer
